title: BRIEF-Capitaland Says Aims To More Than Double Assets Under Management In India To S$7 Bln By 2024
text:
BRIEF-Capitaland Says Aims To More Than Double Assets Under Management In India To S$7 Bln By 2024

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Oct 01, 2019 10:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Capitaland Says Aims To More Than Double Assets Under Management In India To S$7 Bln By 2024 Oct 1 (Reuters) - Capitaland Ltd : * AIMS TO MORE THAN DOUBLE ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT IN INDIA TO S$7 BILLION BY 2024 * CO WILL INVEST CAPITAL TO GROW DEVELOPMENT PIPELINE AND WORK WITH CAPITAL PARTNERS TO GROW FUND MANAGEMENT BUSINESS IN NEXT 5 YEARS * AIMS TO DOUBLE CO'S BUSINESS AND IT PARKS, INDUSTRIAL AND LOGISTICS PROPERTIES IN INDIA TO ABOUT 40 MILLION SQ FT BY 2024. * PLANS TO GROW ITS ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT (AUM) IN INDIA FROM CURRENT S$3.3 BILLION TO S$7 BILLION

BRIEF-Capitaland Says Aims To More Than Double Assets Under Management In India To S$7 Bln By 2024
description: BRIEF-Capitaland Says Aims To More Than Double Assets Under Management In India To S$7 Bln By 2024
